work.company: CJ CGV Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh City
work.desc:
CJ CGV is a unit under CJ Group - one of the largest diversified economy groups of South Korea which is present in 21 countries around the world. CJ CGV has been present in many countries with developing film industries in the world, such as South Korea, the U.S. and China. In Vietnam, after acquiring a majority share in MegaStar Cineplex, CGV is the number 1 cinema brand with 13 movie theaters across the country.

I am fully support accountable for the quality, timeliness, effectiveness and target of staff recruiting for the whole circuit, as well as projects defined by the management from time to time.

work.company: B’Smart - BJC’s Vietnam CVS, Ho Chi Minh City

education.studyType: Certificate, Human Resources Management and Services
Bachelor's degree, Business Administration and Management, General
